translation.en: [man] Beer.
A wise man once said
that beer makes you feel the way you ought to feel without beer.
translation.zh:
‎啤酒让你感受到
‎没有啤酒时应有的感觉

translation.en: Couldn't agree more.
First one's on the house.
Uh, actually, I'm looking for the Accommodator.
translation.zh: ‎其实吧 我是想买头戴款

translation.en: Sorry. We don't have the Accommodator.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉 我们没有头戴款啤酒

translation.en: Yeah, it's not a beer. It's a dildo.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 不是啤酒 是假阳具

translation.en: [stammering] What? Why does everyone think this is a porn shop?
translation.zh:
‎什么？为什么人人都觉得
‎这里是色情商品店呢？

translation.en: Well, we're in Van Nuys,
and you spelled "extreme" with triple X's, so...
Okay, because my last name is Rodman, and the beer,
translation.zh: ‎好吧 因为我姓罗德曼 ‎你要尝到的啤酒 是非常极品的

translation.en: as you will taste, is very extreme.
translation.zh: ‎你要尝到的啤酒 是非常极品的

translation.en: -This is my most drinkable ale. -Mmm!
It's called the Rod Guzzler.
Yeah.
-This is bright beer. Nothing fresher. -Bright beer.
translation.zh:
‎-这是清啤酒 清爽无比
‎-清啤酒

translation.en: -Okay. -[Rodman] Yeah.
[customer] Mmm! Incredible.
If you just sold dildos and fetish wear
like you advertise, this place would be a home run, Wilheim.
translation.zh:
‎就像广告牌写的
‎这里肯定超多顾客的 威脸

translation.en: My name's Wilhelm.
My real name's Will, but I had it legally changed to Wilhelm,
translation.zh:
‎我本来叫威尔
‎但我把名字改成了威廉

translation.en: in honor of the Bavarian duke responsible for the Reinheitsgebot,
translation.zh:
‎为了纪念颁布《啤酒纯酿法》的
‎巴伐利亚公爵

translation.en: which is the beer purity law of 1516.
Ooh, Chuy, Chuy, Ch-Chuy! Come here!
Come here. You gotta meet this guy.
Chuy used to work at the auto body shop next door,
translation.zh: ‎楚伊以前在隔壁的汽车修理厂工作

translation.en: and I poached him because he wanted a little career change.
translation.zh: ‎我把他挖来 因为他想换工作

translation.en: I wanna be a businessman, so I watch him.
translation.zh: ‎我想成为一个商人 所以我观察他

translation.en: Oh, thank you, Chuy.
If I just do the opposite of whatever he does,
translation.zh: ‎无论他做什么 我就反着做

translation.en: sky's the limit for me.
-[Wilhelm laughs] Yeah. -Okay.
Hey, boss, tonight I'm throwing a tasting party
translation.zh: ‎老板 今晚我想开一个品酒会

translation.en: for my soccer buds.
Mind if I take home a little research?
Take whatever you want. You know that's the rule.
translation.zh: ‎想拿什么 就拿什么 你知道规矩的

translation.en: Thank you. Later, man.
What a great guy, right?
-Incredible. -He's a gem.
-[customer] You're lucky to have him. -Nope, drop it.
translation.zh:
‎-你能雇他 真是幸运
‎-不行 放下

translation.en: Oh, man.
Your car's being towed.
Oh, shit.
-Mm-kay. Bye. -[customer] Oh, shit.
-So sorry. See you again. -Bye, Ben. Nice meeting you.
translation.zh:
‎-替你遗憾哟 回头见了
‎-很高兴认识你

translation.en: -Bye! Okay. -Hope you get your dildo.
Stop letting Chuy take the booze.
Will, what are you doing?
-LeBron James or Abe Lincoln? -[laughs]
translation.zh: ‎像不像勒布朗詹姆斯或林肯？

translation.en: -Colonel Sanders. -[coughs]
Oh, my God, Will, get your shit together.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 威尔 淡定一点

translation.en: [laughing] Everything is gonna be fine, okay?
The distributor's coming by today. He likes our beer.
translation.zh:
‎经销商今天会过来
‎他喜欢我们的啤酒

translation.en: -We're golden. Stop being a buzzkill. -Oh, my God. I--
translation.zh:
‎-我们最棒了 宝贝 不要扫兴了
‎-天啊 别闹了

translation.en: I see how much you drink, okay? Nothing can kill your buzz.
translation.zh: ‎你喝多了 好吗？没人能扫你的酒兴

translation.en: Even your dog is day drunk.
So what? He's a little drunk.
-Friar Lucas knows when to say when. -Does he?
translation.zh: ‎卢卡斯修士知道适可而止 ‎是吗？

translation.en: Come here. I got a question for you.
-Why did you put the darts on this side? -[Wilhelm] Ah, let me tell you why.
translation.zh: ‎你为什么把飞镖放在这边？ ‎让我告诉你为什么吧

translation.en: I needed room for my latest genius promotion.
translation.zh: ‎我需要地方 留给我的天才促销方式…

translation.en: Ta-da, huh? Pretty good.
You take a growler home with you,
and then you get another one for free when you come back.
translation.zh: ‎下次回来时 可以免费再得一坛

translation.en: -It's gonna catch on like wildfire. -[older man grunting]
I think it already has.
No, hey, that is the wrong kind of growler.
translation.zh: ‎不要啊 一滩的意思不是这样

translation.en: You can't do that here!
Hey, the sign says I can.
"Take a growler, leave a growler." Same thing.
translation.zh: ‎“拿走一坛 留下一滩” 一个意思

translation.en: No, not my kind of growlers.
-Please, get out of here. -[squelches]
Oh, no, no, no!
Yes. You see, to my point,
translation.zh: ‎是啊 你看啊 在我看来

translation.en: I'm taking a growler here, and this morning,
translation.zh: ‎我在这里来一滩 今天早晨时

translation.en: I left a growler there.
You see? Same thing.
-You need shoes. -It's sanitary.
translation.zh:
‎-挺卫生的
‎-听着 你显然需要一双鞋

translation.en: -I... don't need these anymore. -[groans]
You have to promise me you will stop taking a growler!
translation.zh: ‎你得跟我保证 以后别在这里大便了

translation.en: But can I leave a growler?
translation.zh: ‎但我可以在那边留下一滩吗？

translation.en: I'm gonna give you my shoes, and you're gonna go, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我把我的鞋给你 ‎然后你就走吧 好吗？

translation.en: [older man] But that I could, my dear man.
Since the death of printed media, I'm at a loss for wipes, hmm?
translation.zh: ‎自从印刷媒体消亡以来 ‎我就没有擦屁股纸了

translation.en: Ever tried to wipe your ass with a Kindle?
-[groans] -No!
-Back to the statehouse, Senator. -Senator? What?
translation.zh:
‎-回州议会去吧 参议员
‎-参议员？ ‎什么？

translation.en: The rock shoe of the white, urban climber.
translation.zh: ‎迈乐鞋呀 白人城市攀爬者的攀岩鞋

translation.en: [man] Hmm. The hops are timid, and there's a meek earthiness vying for attention.
translation.zh:
‎啤酒花味道淡淡的
‎有一股温柔的泥土气息很勾人

translation.en: [smacks lips] Detecting a delicate bouquet of pine with notes of citrus.
translation.zh: ‎有一股松树的清香 带有柑橘的味道

translation.en: Possibly clementines?
-[Chuy] He's good. -[smacks lips]
If the brewmaster remembered that he was making a beer
translation.zh: ‎如果酿酒师记得他做的是啤酒

translation.en: and not a smoothie, you might really have something here.
translation.zh: ‎而不是冰沙 也许就能做出点东西

translation.en: Unfortunately, the beer, much like the brewmaster himself,
translation.zh: ‎可惜啤酒就像酿酒师自己的味道

translation.en: smells like, as he would say, "Scheiße!" [chuckles]
-You can pour that out. -Hello, Adam.
translation.zh:
‎-你可以倒出来
‎-你好 亚当

translation.en: -Nice to see you, too. -[Adam] Hi.
Wait. Who's this guy?
-My brother. -Bring it in.
-[thuds] -[laughs] Oh, shit!
[chuckles softly] Family.
-Will, I didn't know you had a brother. -Yeah, I haven't seen Oxy in a long time.
translation.zh: ‎威尔 我不知道你还有哥哥 ‎是啊 我也很久没见氧氧了

translation.en: Aww, that's a cute nickname.
Unless it's short for Oxycontin. [chuckles]
No, it's short for oxidation.
Oxidation destroys beer... and Adam destroys everything.
translation.zh: ‎氧化反应会毁掉啤酒 ‎亚当会毁掉一切

translation.en: I can get you Oxy.
We should be so close.
[Wilhelm] Adam and I were adopted by farmers in beautiful Yakima Valley.
translation.zh: ‎亚当和我是被农民收养的 ‎住在美丽的雅基马山谷

translation.en: And as you know, that's where 70% of American hops are grown.
translation.zh:
‎你们知道 美国70%的啤酒花
‎都是在那里种植的

translation.en: [woman] Nobody knows that, and nobody cares.
I'm actually angry that I know now.
translation.zh: ‎我现在知道了 都有点生气呢

translation.en: [Wilhelm] Pipe down! I'm painting a picture.
Adam snuck me my first beer, and I thought it was horrible.
translation.zh: ‎亚当给我喝了第一罐啤酒 ‎我觉得难喝极了

translation.en: And that's when he said, "We can make it better."
translation.zh: ‎然后他说 ：“我们可以让它更好喝”

translation.en: The next few years,
we became the best beer-making duo around.
translation.zh: ‎我们成了附近最好的酿酒二人组

translation.en: We even entered a beer contest.
translation.zh: ‎我们还参加了一个啤酒比赛

translation.en: [woman] You guys entered a beer contest when you were that young?
translation.zh: ‎你们那么年轻就参加啤酒比赛了？

translation.en: -[crowd cheering] -[Wilhelm] And we won.
-[woman] That's great. -[Wilhelm] Not great.
Adam really wanted to use his beer,
but I knew mine was better, so...
translation.zh: ‎但我知道我的更好 所以…

translation.en: at the last minute, I switched them.
When he found out...
...he was pissed.
I will never work with you again.
Traitor! [grunts]
And I never saw him again... till today.
translation.zh: ‎然后我们再没见过 直到今天

translation.en: Look, the guy makes really, really good beer.
translation.zh: ‎听着 那家伙做的啤酒非常非常棒

translation.en: -It's just that-- -Will, like, come on.
You spent your money on a place that's way too big,
translation.zh: ‎你花钱租的这个地方面积太大了

translation.en: and there's barely any customers.
Um, by the way, boss, "taking a growler" means "to shit."
translation.zh: ‎而且 老板 “一滩”其实有歧义

translation.en: Where were you a week ago?
Whatever you think about your brother, if he makes amazing beer,
translation.zh:
‎无论你怎么看待你哥 ‎如果他酿酒很棒
‎为什么不给他一次机会呢？

translation.en: why not give him a shot?
translation.zh:
‎如果他酿酒很棒
‎为什么不给他一次机会呢？

translation.en: So...
I have discussed it with my team, and we have decided
translation.zh: ‎我跟我的团队商量过了 ‎我们决定

translation.en: to let you work with us on the following conditions--
translation.zh: ‎允许你加入 但是有以下条件

translation.en: I accept.
We gotta make a lot of changes around here.
You gotta change the way you're marketing this place.
Yes, okay, great. That's exactly what we shall do.
translation.zh: ‎好的 这正是我们应该做的

translation.en: [Adam] Okay, let's get rid of that barrel, these menus.
translation.zh: ‎好的 把这些桶拿走 还有这些菜单… ‎什么？

translation.en: -What? -Get rid of those games. No chairs, no tables.
translation.zh: ‎还有那边的游戏 不要桌椅了

translation.en: Send 'em back to the junkyard I assume you got them from.
translation.zh: ‎都送回垃圾场 你就是从那淘来的吧

translation.en: Maybe board up these windows.
-Why? -'Cause they look like shit.
Okay, pool tables and beer pong, here we come.
No, the opposite. We want this whole place to be stripped down.
translation.zh: ‎不不 恰恰相反 ‎我们需要把这里变成极简风

translation.en: We want people to be able to meditate on the beer.
translation.zh: ‎我们希望人们对着啤酒冥想

translation.en: I want our customers to see the way I prepare the grist for the mash tun.
translation.zh:
‎我想让顾客们看到
‎我为糖化锅准备麦芽

translation.en: -Oh, my God, he is worse than you. -Told ya.
translation.zh:
‎天啊 他比你还糟糕 ‎-我早就说了
‎-你们也可以稍微打扮一下

translation.en: And you guys could really stand to fix yourselves up a little bit.
translation.zh:
‎-我早就说了
‎-你们也可以稍微打扮一下

translation.en: Do you work here?
Yes.
Yes, Chuy, you work here.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 楚伊 你就是员工

translation.en: -Yes! Yes. -Yes, you do. You do.
Okay, great. And you're wearing sandals in a brewery?
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你在酿酒厂穿着拖鞋吗？

translation.en: -Pool wear? -Yes.
-Yes. -[Adam] All right.
There's something about you. I like you. Put your hair up, pull it back.
translation.zh:
‎你很有料哦 我喜欢你 ‎你可以把头发梳到后面
‎让发型更好看一些

translation.en: Make it more presentable.
translation.zh:
‎你可以把头发梳到后面
‎让发型更好看一些

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, sure thing.
-[Adam] Sick! Look at her ear. It's bad. -What?
translation.zh:
‎-恶心！快看看她的耳朵
‎-怎么了？

translation.en: -Y-Your ear is all messed up. -Oh, my God. Calm down.
translation.zh:
‎-你的耳朵太恶心了
‎-天啊 ‎别激动 就是菜花耳而已

translation.en: It's just cauliflower ear.
translation.zh: ‎别激动 就是菜花耳而已

translation.en: Yeah, but it is gross. Looks like a dog chewed on it.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 但确实很恶心 ‎-谢谢
‎-就像被狗咬过

translation.en: It stinks, too.
-It stinks? -[woman] It doesn't.
Sarah used to be an MMA fighter.
Yeah, and I had to retire after I got injured.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 我受伤以后就退役了

translation.en: -Oh, my God. -[Sarah] It's an injury.
I bet people are so happy to not see that melted thing.
translation.zh:
‎我敢打赌 人们不用再看那东西了
‎肯定很开心

translation.en: What? They love it, okay? They love me and my ear.
translation.zh: ‎人们很喜欢的 喜欢我和我的耳朵

translation.en: [Adam] Okay.
-Bye. Bye. -[Sarah] Come on, we got shit to do.
-[Adam groans] -Hello, hello. Welcome to Rodman's.
translation.zh: ‎你们好 欢迎光临罗德曼酒吧

translation.en: What can I get you?
Hi. Um, can I have a Stella?
translation.zh: ‎嗨 能来一杯时代啤酒吗？

translation.en: We actually only serve our own beer here, so we don't have Stella,
translation.zh: ‎我们只卖自己酿的啤酒 ‎所以没有时代啤酒

translation.en: but I'd be happy to find you something that is similar-- Sorry, you want a Stella?
translation.zh:
‎-但我很愿意给您找一款差不多的…
‎-抱歉 你想喝时代啤酒？

translation.en: No, Stella is the most unoriginal beer in the world.
translation.zh: ‎时代啤酒是世界上最没创意的啤酒

translation.en: So that means that you're the most unoriginal person in the world.
translation.zh: ‎这就说明你是世界上最没创意的人

translation.en: What about you? Hi, how are you?
-What are you thinking of having? -Do you have something like a Bud Light?
translation.zh:
‎-你想喝什么？
‎-你们有类似百威淡啤的酒吗？

translation.en: No, no, no. Bud Light, Bud Light, Bud Light. [snorts, spits]
You can lap that up. It'll taste like Bud Light.
translation.zh: ‎你可以舔掉 跟百威淡啤一样味道

translation.en: That's so gross.
I apologize on his behalf. The drinks are on me.
translation.zh: ‎我替他跟你们道歉 ‎我请你们喝酒

translation.en: -We'll go to a different bar. -Weird.
[Wilhelm] If we could buy your first round--
translation.zh: ‎美女们 第一杯我请你们喝吧…

translation.en: -No! Please come back again! -[door slams]
What are you doing? You can't turn people away.
translation.zh: ‎你在干什么？你不能拒绝客人啊

translation.en: Come on, they were barely people.
They wanted to drink a Stella and a Bud Light.
translation.zh: ‎她们想喝时代啤酒和百威淡啤

translation.en: Beer is about bringing people together,
translation.zh: ‎啤酒就是要拉近人们的关系

translation.en: and Rodman's is the perfect hang.
translation.zh: ‎而罗德曼酒吧就是最好的地方

translation.en: What matters most is making the perfect beer.
translation.zh: ‎最重要的是酿造出完美的啤酒

translation.en: -Everything else is immaterial. -[Wilhelm] No.
translation.zh:
‎-其他都无关紧要
‎-不是的 氧氧

translation.en: What matters most is serving people,
regardless of their beer preference, race, religion.
translation.zh: ‎不管他们的啤酒偏好、种族、宗教

translation.en: That's the German way.
No, I don't think that's right.
[Wilhelm] I've never needed you.
When you went off to Oregon State at 14 to get your stupid beer degree...
translation.zh:
‎当你14岁
‎去俄勒冈州立大学读那个破学位时…

translation.en: My master's of agricultural chemistry and zymurgy?
translation.zh: ‎我的农业化学和发酵硕士吗？

translation.en: ...I was learning how to make beer the hard way:
translation.zh: ‎我在艰难地学习如何酿造啤酒

translation.en: on the streets and outdoor plazas of Europe.
translation.zh: ‎在欧洲的大街上和室外广场上

translation.en: Do have any idea how many beer gardens I drank my way through
translation.zh: ‎你知道我喝过多少露天啤酒店

translation.en: -before I perfected my craft? -[Adam] And what craft is that?
translation.zh: ‎才完善了我的手艺吗？ ‎你到底有什么手艺呢？

translation.en: Throwing up on yourself
and then contracting super gonorrhea from a youth hostel toilet seat?
translation.zh:
‎然后从青年旅社的马桶座圈上
‎感染超级淋病吗？

translation.en: So you do follow me on Instagram!
Okay, so you were able to drag your gonorrhea-riddled member
translation.zh: ‎好吧 你可以把你的淋病患者

translation.en: into a monastery where they make beer, and you memorized their recipes.
translation.zh: ‎拖进修道院 看他们在那里做啤酒 ‎然后记住他们的配方

translation.en: That does not make you a Braumeister.
translation.zh: ‎这样不能让你成为酿酒师的

translation.en: That makes you a Xerox machine.
What's a Xerox machine?
Can you get her out of here, please? Go.
Hi, sir.
Welcome to Rodman's. What can I get you?
translation.zh: ‎欢迎光临罗德曼酒吧 喝点什么？

translation.en: I'll have whatever you recommend.
translation.zh: ‎你推荐什么 我就喝什么

translation.en: [Wilhelm] Whatever I recommend. Excellent.
Adam, this is how you run a brewery. Let me pull my Rodman Stiff Stout for you.
translation.zh: ‎亚当 开酿酒厂就要这样 ‎我给您来一杯罗德曼硬硬黑啤吧

translation.en: Oh, I gotta change that name.
And he wonders why people think we're a sex store.
translation.zh:
‎他还好奇为什么别人都以为
‎我们卖性用品呢

translation.en: -[Adam] People don't think about you guys. -Here you go, sir.
translation.zh: ‎人们不会想到你们的 ‎给您 先生

translation.en: -[man] Thank you. -[Wilhelm] Take a sip.
-[man] Tasty. -Thank you.
-[smacks lips] Are you Wilhelm Rodman? -Mm-hmm.
You are three months behind on your rent.
translation.zh: ‎你已经… ‎拖欠三个月的房租了

translation.en: Pay up or you're gonna be evicted.
translation.zh: ‎赶紧付钱 不然就要被扫地出门了

translation.en: This is really good.
It's definitely not,
and I would've gotten him out of here two or three months ago.
translation.zh:
‎如果是我
‎两三个月前就把他赶出去了

translation.en: Hey, Will, how do you say "you're fucked" in German?
translation.zh: ‎威尔 “你完蛋了” 用德语怎么说？

translation.en: [in German] You are fucked!
[in English] I picked up a few things.
[Wilhelm] Okay, we are not going out of business.
We need to spend all of our time in putting together the perfect flight
translation.zh:
‎我们需要集中精力
‎准备一次完美的推介

translation.en: to impress the hell outta this distributor.
translation.zh: ‎让经销商能够留下深刻印象

translation.en: What's your favorite beer?
I can run to Angel City and pick up a few kegs.
translation.zh: ‎我可以去天使之城 去选几桶啤酒

translation.en: [gasps] That's genius.
I mean, I-I love where this guy's head is at.
-You're great. -Thank you.
-I don't like where this is going. -It feels good here.
translation.zh:
‎-我不喜欢这样
‎-我觉得挺好的

translation.en: What the fuck?
-[woman grunts] -[Wilhelm] You came in a little hot again.
translation.zh: ‎你们入场的方式有点危险啊

translation.en: [woman] Sorry about that.
It's really hard to park when digitally stimulating each other.
translation.zh:
‎-抱歉
‎-停车有点困难 ‎因为我俩正在用手指互相刺激呢

translation.en: You can park safely, or you can orgasm at the same time.
translation.zh: ‎安全停车和享受高潮 二者不可得兼

translation.en: -I choose the orgasm. -[Adam] Cool.
Hey, this is my brother Adam.
[chuckles] You guys look nothing alike.
-Thank you. -Danke.
-You look like lovers. -[Wilhelm] What?
[woman] Yeah, lovers.
-[man] Do you ever...? -No!
-That'd be fun. -Cute.
[Wilhelm] Barely talk.
Kids Menu! Open for business!
-Chicken fingers! Corn dogs! -Mac and cheese!
translation.zh:
‎-鸡柳条！玉米热狗！
‎-芝士通心粉！

translation.en: Juice boxes! Everything organic...
-[both] ...and locally sourced. -[Adam] Wow.
And adults actually consume this stuff?
Hell yeah, dude. Everyone loves ordering off the kids' menu.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 哥们 人人都喜欢点儿童餐的

translation.en: -Who doesn't love a kids' menu? -Right?
But restaurants make it off-limits for grown-ups.
-[man] For us... -[both] ...nothing is off-limits.
-That's what I was gonna say. -I was gonna say that.
-You're not-- oh, my-- -[both moaning]
[Wilhelm] Nothing's off-limits.
How do you do it? You live together, you work together.
translation.zh:
‎你们怎么做到的？
‎你们一起住 一起工作

translation.en: I'm presuming that you don't share deodorant together.
Correct. Deodorant is a tool of the government
translation.zh:
‎-是的
‎-体香剂是一种政府工具

translation.en: -to track you. -[woman] To control you.
They put, uh, salt in it--
Aluminum, baby.
Thank you, babe. They put aluminum in it, and that's how they know where you are.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 宝贝 他们在里面加入铝 ‎所以就能知道你的位置了

translation.en: God, it is so concerning that you run a food truck
translation.zh: ‎天啊 太让人担心了 你们做餐车生意

translation.en: and you confused aluminum and salt.
Oh, no, they're both fine to eat.
-You can just not put one under your arm. -[woman] Yeah.
Do you guys ever get sick of each other?
translation.zh: ‎你们俩有过厌倦对方的时候吗？

translation.en: We've been together ten months and haven't spent a moment apart.
translation.zh: ‎我们在一起十个月了 从没分开过

translation.en: -Not one moment. -What about when you go to the bathroom?
translation.zh:
‎-从来没有
‎-哇哦 ‎那你们上厕所的时候呢？

translation.en: [both] What about it?
-Can I order something? -Yes. We need hairnets.
translation.zh:
‎-我能点东西吃吗？
‎-可以啊 ‎我们需要发网

translation.en: Yes, sanitation is so important.
[Adam] Totally.
Okay.
Cool, cool, cool. I'm gonna go.
-Uh, you should join me as well. -[woman] Hold on.
You didn't dig in deep back there.
Here, want me to give you a lift? Step on my hand.
translation.zh:
‎需要我抬你一把吗？ ‎-可以吗？
‎-踩我手上吧

translation.en: -[Wilhelm] Adam! -Yeah.
I think he's about to put a hairnet over his hat.
translation.zh: ‎他好像要用发网罩住他的帽子

translation.en: [woman] Yeah, there you go. Okay, right up there.
translation.zh: ‎好了 可以了 就在上面

translation.en: -[man] Hello. -[Wilhelm] Hi.
Cole Harris.
-East Valley Craft Distribution. -[Wilhelm] Yes.
-Wilhelm Rodman, brewmaster. -[Adam] Hello.
translation.zh:
‎-威廉罗德曼 酿酒师
‎-你好

translation.en: Adam Rodman. Hi. Head brewmaster.
translation.zh: ‎亚当罗德曼 我是首席酿酒师

translation.en: -Hi there. Hi. -Okay. Hi.
-[laughing] -[Adam] Don't make it weird.
-Let him go. -All right.
-So sorry. -[Cole] Okay.
-Cool. -[Adam] Mm-hmm.
So, uh, which one of you is in charge?
[both] I am.
Family business, like the Lehman Brothers.
translation.zh: ‎家族生意哈 就像雷曼兄弟

translation.en: [stammers] Yeah. Uh, big fans.
You don't know who they are. They stole a lot of money. [laughs]
translation.zh: ‎你不认识他们 他们骗了好多钱

translation.en: Take a seat, and I will bring a flight that is going to...
translation.zh: ‎去坐吧 我一会给您上酒 一定让您…

translation.en: bedazzle you.
Okay. Great.
"Bedazzle" him?
-Oof! That was bad, even for you. -I am nervous!
translation.zh:
‎-太差劲了 甚至对你来说
‎-我太紧张了！

translation.en: So, what restaurants are gonna be serving my beer selection?
translation.zh: ‎哪些餐厅会供应我们的啤酒呢？

translation.en: Off the top of my head, I think the Tipsy Cow
translation.zh:
‎我首先想到的
‎是醉牛餐厅和当地农民餐厅

translation.en: and the Local Peasant have a tap open for local brews.
translation.zh:
‎我首先想到的
‎是醉牛餐厅和当地农民餐厅 ‎这两家都供应本地酒厂的产品

translation.en: Fantastic. And these establishments, what kind of savory apps are they serving?
translation.zh: ‎很好 ‎这些餐厅主要供应什么餐食呢？

translation.en: Uh, I mean, I-I really enjoy the short-rib poutine.
translation.zh: ‎要我说 我很喜欢肋排肉酱薯条

translation.en: -Are you writing that down? -[Adam] I'm not.
-I see you writing things down. -It looks like that, but I'm not.
translation.zh: ‎我看你正在记录呢 ‎看起来是这样 但我没有…

translation.en: You just wrote down what I like to eat.
translation.zh: ‎你把我喜欢吃什么都记下来了

translation.en: I honestly did not. You can trust me.
translation.zh: ‎我真没有 你可以相信我

translation.en: -Okay. -But I-I'm curious,
how often do these establishments clean out their taps?
translation.zh: ‎这些餐厅多久清洗一次酒桶龙头？

translation.en: Uh, I don't-- When they're supposed to?
-Okay, that's all I need. -[Cole] Are you writing that down?
translation.zh:
‎-好的 我就需要这些信息了
‎-你在记录吗？

translation.en: -This isn't gonna work out. -Excuse me?
Wait, are you interviewing me?
I'm interviewing you.
-[Wilhelm] No! -[Adam] Now that the interview's over,
I am willing to admit to you I've been writing things down.
translation.zh: ‎我愿意承认 我一直在记录

translation.en: I knew it. You wrote it all down.
translation.zh: ‎我就知道 你都记下来了

translation.en: Adam! Adam! I'm so sorry about him.
Why don't you take a quick sample of our four most popular beers?
translation.zh:
‎要不您先尝尝
‎我们最受欢迎的四款啤酒吧？

translation.en: -[Cole] Okay. -[Adam] Let me stop you.
I believe that we have a right to know
if the food these establishments are serving
tastes like, as you would say, große Scheiße,
which is German for--
-Yeah, I know what it means. -It's like "big shit."
translation.zh:
‎-是啊 我知道这句话的意思
‎-“像屎一样”

translation.en: -[Cole] Yeah. -I don't know if you knew that.
-I knew it. -[Adam] Okay.
You know what I think? I think we're done here.
translation.zh: ‎你知道我在想什么吗？ ‎我觉得就到这里吧

translation.en: Done? You're gonna order without sampling?
translation.zh:
‎这就完了？
‎你不品尝就下单吗？太棒了

translation.en: Incredible. How many kegs can we sign you up for?
I think I'll order... nein. Which is German for "none."
translation.zh: ‎一桶也不用了 ‎这句话也是德语哦

translation.en: -[Adam] Oh, no, it's not. -See what I did?
No, nein would actually just be "no."
[Wilhelm] Cole, please, please--
-[Adam] Bye! -What are you doing?
I just hope the next guy's more collaborative.
translation.zh: ‎我只是希望下一个人能更有合作精神

translation.en: That's what I'll say.
What next guy? There's one guy in Van Nuys!
translation.zh: ‎什么下一个人？凡奈斯就这一家！

translation.en: One guy!
There's one distributor, and it's that guy? [grunts]
translation.zh: ‎就一家经销商 就是他吗？

translation.en: Van Nuys, it's a bad place-- [groans]
-Is this what happened to your ear? -Shut up, you baby!
translation.zh:
‎-你的耳朵就是这样烂的吗？
‎-闭嘴 小婴儿！

translation.en: You know what?
-I never should've tracked you down. -I never should've accepted your offer.
translation.zh:
‎-我就不该费事找你来
‎-我就不该接受你的邀请

translation.en: This place is even more of a disaster than your melted ear.
-I feel bad for Chuy. -Wanna go for round two?
translation.zh:
‎我很同情楚伊 ‎-你想要第二轮吗？
‎-不了！

translation.en: -[Adam] I don't! -See where he parked?
translation.zh:
‎-你想要第二轮吗？
‎-不了！ ‎-他把车停哪了？
‎-我去找他吧

translation.en: -I'll find him. -[Wilhelm] Thanks.
You are doing the same thing you always do.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 氧氧 你还是老样子

translation.en: -You ruin everything. -Oh, hard disagree.
No, don't sit. You're out. Get out.
translation.zh: ‎不要坐了 你出局了 快走吧

translation.en: -I'm out? -Uh-huh.
-[Adam] Okay. -This is done.
-[Adam] Okay, great. -Yeah.
-Bye. -See ya. This was a wonderful reunion.
translation.zh:
‎-很好 拜拜
‎-再见 很高兴能重聚

translation.en: Bye.
-Fuck. -What?
I have nowhere else to go.
What do you mean? You said you were killing it in Portland.
translation.zh: ‎什么意思？ ‎你说你在波特兰特别成功

translation.en: [Adam] I was.
I had a falling out with the local brewers.
-There's, like, 100 breweries out there. -There's 84.
translation.zh:
‎-那边有上百家啤酒厂
‎-一共84家

translation.en: And a lot of them are very bad.
Some of them, their best brews taste like the cadaver of a local garbageman.
translation.zh:
‎有些酒厂最好的啤酒
‎尝起来就像当地垃圾处理工的尸体

translation.en: I say that as a fan.
Did you tell them that?
Yes, I told them that, okay? It was at a beer expo.
translation.zh:
‎是啊 我说了 行吗？
‎当时是啤酒展销会

translation.en: Someone gave me a microphone, I started riffing,
translation.zh: ‎有人把话筒给我 我就即兴说了一段

translation.en: and people couldn't handle it.
I also had a problem with the fact
that they were letting IPAs into the competitions.
translation.zh:
‎他们竟然同意
‎让印度淡色艾尔参加比赛

translation.en: IPAs are what people drink when they're all out of good ideas
translation.zh:
‎人们没有好点子了
‎才会去喝印度淡色艾尔

translation.en: or never had a good idea to begin with.
-[booing] -Oh-- Okay, okay, yeah!
So I submitted an IPA that had a hallucinogen in it.
translation.zh:
‎所以我提交了一种
‎含有致幻剂的印度淡色艾尔

translation.en: You tried to drug everyone?
That's the difference between you and me.
You try, I succeed.
translation.zh: ‎你还在努力 我已经成功了

translation.en: -[dance music playing] -[distorted] How's that for an IPA?
translation.zh: ‎这款印度艾尔啤酒怎么样呀？

translation.en: You can't tell, but I'm giving you all the finger.
translation.zh: ‎你们看不出来 但我在向你们竖中指

translation.en: So for that reason, I'm no longer allowed to brew in Portland,
translation.zh: ‎因此 我就不能再在波特兰酿酒了

translation.en: or be in Portland...
or be in Oregon. I gotta stay here.
translation.zh: ‎或者在俄勒冈州 我得留在这里

translation.en: You're a bad person if you make me leave...
translation.zh: ‎如果你赶我走 你就是坏人

translation.en: frankly.
Columbus.
Simcoe, from back home.
Hmm, pretty sure it's Columbus.
I can't believe I'm about to say this,
but I guess we can try working together again.
translation.zh: ‎但是我觉得 我们可以试试再次合作

translation.en: Thank you. I appreciate that.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 威尔 非常感谢

translation.en: And this room'll do.
-This-- It'll do. So, we're good. -What? No.
translation.zh:
‎-可以的 没问题
‎-什么？不要

translation.en: The bed feels like the natural spot.
translation.zh:
‎-这张床感觉很舒服
‎-不要 亚当

translation.en: -Oh, yeah. -Don't!
-Come on, man, that's my spot. -Sorry about the shoes.
translation.zh:
‎-拜托 哥们 那是我的地方
‎-抱歉我没脱鞋

translation.en: There's so many other spots you can live.
-I belong here. -It's my bed.
-It feels like it's my bed. -You don't wanna sleep there.
translation.zh:
‎-感觉就像是我的床
‎-你不想睡在这里的

translation.en: I jerk off... a lot...
-here. -You want to talk about that right now?
No, I'm just saying, I wouldn't want to, like, lay in your juice,
translation.zh:
‎不是 我就是想说
‎我不愿意躺在你的分泌物上

translation.en: -so why would you want to lay-- -In my "juice"?
translation.zh:
‎-你为什么会想要…
‎-我的“分泌物”？

translation.en: -You want to know what I do? -No.
I edge myself to orgasm
but once a month.
Twelve times a year. You know math?
And basically, you pleasure yourself right to the point of climax,
translation.zh: ‎基本是这样的 你自己自摸 ‎就要达到高潮时 就把自己拉回来

translation.en: and then you dial it back.
translation.zh: ‎就要达到高潮时 就把自己拉回来

translation.en: And you do that every single day for 30 days,
translation.zh: ‎一个月30天 天天都这么做

translation.en: and then right on that last day, you just... explode.
translation.zh: ‎然后在最后一天时 ‎爆发一次

translation.en: And what you produce is like a bottle-conditioned saison:
translation.zh:
‎你射出的东西就像
‎瓶内发酵的赛尚啤酒

translation.en: frothy, rich, distinct.
Right now, I'm kinda sensitive 'cause I'm on day nine.
translation.zh: ‎现在我有点敏感 因为现在是第九天

translation.en: So... fermentation has just begun.
I am frickin' amazing.
I convinced the distributor to come back in a couple weeks,
translation.zh: ‎我说服经销商了 ‎他几周后再过来

translation.en: on two conditions.
One: he's not allowed to talk.
Oh, no.
Two: I promised you'd make a new beer for him.
translation.zh: ‎第二 我答应他 你会新酿一款啤酒

translation.en: -Yes, yes, yes, yes. -[Sarah laughs] Sarah, you-- you're incredible.
translation.zh: ‎太好了 莎拉 你太棒了

translation.en: I know.
What to brew? What to brew?
What about a lager?
A lager? No, it takes too long to brew.
translation.zh: ‎拉格啤酒？不行 酿造时间太长

translation.en: Not that I've made one since I was in diapers.
translation.zh: ‎不过我穿尿布时 就酿过一次了

translation.en: What about a rauch porter?
No. Smoked ale, it's too risky.
translation.zh: ‎不 烟熏艾尔 太冒险了

translation.en: What if we make something that everyone's into, like a hazy IPA?
translation.zh:
‎要不做一款大众口味的吧
‎比如浑浊印度淡色艾尔？

translation.en: That's exactly why we shouldn't make it.
translation.zh:
‎-就是不能酿大众口味的
‎-等等 啤酒还分好多种吗？

translation.en: Wait, there's different kinds of beers? Why?
translation.zh:
‎-就是不能酿大众口味的
‎-等等 啤酒还分好多种吗？ ‎-为什么？
‎-好吧 如果能让你停止抱怨

translation.en: Fine, if it'll make you stop whining, I'll make something hoppier.
translation.zh:
‎-为什么？
‎-好吧 如果能让你停止抱怨 ‎我就做点啤酒花浓的

translation.en: Oh, my God, I'm in LA for one day, and I'm already selling out.
translation.zh:
‎天啊 我刚来洛杉矶一天
‎就已经开始媚俗了

translation.en: No, I'm used to making them. I'm gonna make it.
translation.zh: ‎不不 我经常酿这种 我来酿吧

translation.en: -You? -Yeah.
You think you can brew a better beer than me, Wilhelm the Lesser?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得你的手艺比我更好吗
‎技逊一筹的威廉？

translation.en: I know I can.
-May the best beer win. -[scoffs] Okay.
-Can I-- No. -[Adam] I'm not gonna fight you.
-You got there after me. -Unfair.
-[Adam] Let go. -[Wilhelm] No.
-We're not-- -[Adam] Let go of my leg.
[Wilhelm] Why is this vest so slippery?
Be still, my hairless avenger. [sighs]
Just 15 more sleeps, big guy.
-I can hear you. -[Adam] No, I know.
You listening is an important part of the process.
translation.zh: ‎你在旁边听着 也是很重要的环节

translation.en: What time are you gonna go paint that house, you cretin?
translation.zh:
‎你打算什么时候
‎给房子刷刷漆 二货？

translation.en: -What's a cretin? -A "cretin" is an idiot.
translation.zh:
‎-二货是什么意思？
‎-就是傻子的意思

translation.en: Typically, cretins don't know the word "cretin," so...
translation.zh: ‎显然二货不知道二货这个词 所以…

translation.en: Why would you call a--
[Adam] Unbelievable.
-So, is the bat part of your recipe? -No. But this one is.
translation.zh:
‎-球棍也是配料之一吗？
‎-不是 ‎但这个是

translation.en: Hey, I found my keys
and another bat, Will.
Oh, shit, where's my wallet?
[Adam] Don't go back in.
Oh, what is that putrid smell? Right, no, I forgot.
translation.zh: ‎哪来的腐烂味道？ ‎对哦 没事 我忘记了

translation.en: You're brewing as well.
Oh! Acid attack. Oh, my God.
You should go back to your little monk buddies
translation.zh: ‎你应该回去找你的修道士伙伴去

translation.en: and go milling again 'cause this is a ruined batch.
translation.zh: ‎重新去磨麦芽 因为这批已经坏掉了

translation.en: I know what I'm doing, okay?
translation.zh: ‎我知道自己在做什么 好吗？

translation.en: Oh, that has been disproven time and again.
translation.zh: ‎这已经被证实不是真的了 ‎反复证实过了

translation.en: Get off of me, shitty beard!
[Sarah] Nothing like watching two betas fight.
I'm gonna digitally remove their clothes and sell this in Japan.
translation.zh:
‎我要把他们的衣服修掉
‎然后卖到日本去

translation.en: Hey, you're just nervous my beer is gonna be better than yours.
translation.zh: ‎你只是害怕我的啤酒会比你的好

translation.en: [Adam] I'm never nervous!
-Stay there, you little fish. -No!
[laughs] Oh, I gotcha!
Do you give up?
-[grunts] Friar Lucas, attack! -[barks]
[Chuy] Oh, no.
translation.zh: ‎不要 卢卡斯修士 我现在非常敏感

translation.en: [Adam] Friar Lucas, I'm sensitive. I'm very sensitive right now, Friar Lucas.
translation.zh: ‎不要 卢卡斯修士 我现在非常敏感 ‎我现在非常敏感 卢卡斯修士 不要…

translation.en: Oh, I'm ticklish. No, no, no, no. Ooh. [moans]
[grunting] Oh, boy! Oh, it's happening.
What is your problem? Give me that. -Come on. -Come on.
translation.zh:
‎-你有什么毛病？快给我吧
‎-拜托

translation.en: [groans] And I'm back to day one.
I prematurely ejaculated after 29 days. [sighs]
Is that ironic?
Good luck with the distributor today, man.
Thank you, Elvis.
-[groans] -[sighs] Oh, hey, hold on. Take this.
-I don't want it. -It's for luck.
It's my gift to you. Take the gift.
translation.zh: ‎这是我送你的礼物 带上吧

translation.en: Nothing weird about it.
It's just one man giving another man a sandwich.
translation.zh: ‎就是一个男人送另一个男人三明治

translation.en: Where's that negative energy coming from? Your aura is wild right now.
translation.zh: ‎你哪儿来的负能量？ ‎你的气场现在很混乱

translation.en: -[woman] Your fries. -Thank you.
-I'm loving these chicken wings-- -[Wilhelm] You try it.
-Uh, fingers. Fingers. -[chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎-你尝尝吧 卢卡斯
‎-炸鸡柳

translation.en: Rebecckay.
It's Becky.
Yeah, it is.
Ooh, look at you, Field of Dreams. You have zero chance with Becky.
translation.zh: ‎看看你 做梦呢 你不可能追到贝琪的

translation.en: She and Elvis are like the same person.
Oh, Will, I would not expect you to understand chemistry.
translation.zh: ‎威尔 ‎我没指望你能懂什么叫来电

translation.en: -Here. I'll give you a free lecture. -Oh.
translation.zh: ‎看着 我给你免费上一课吧

translation.en: -[both moaning, laughing] -Becky, hey.
Look, I was wondering if I could get a little mustard.
translation.zh: ‎我在想 我能不能来点芥末

translation.en: Thank you. This is relish.
That's good, though.
Chemistry.
She practically stank of sex.
Yeah, because she's currently having it with her boyfriend.
translation.zh: ‎是啊 因为她正在跟男友做爱

translation.en: Hey, guys, the distributor's on his way.
-Shit. -Oh. Great.
Two brand-new IPAs and zero questions about the menu from my brother.
translation.zh:
‎两款全新的印度淡色艾尔
‎我哥哥不会再问菜单的问题了

translation.en: -And let's keep it that way. -[Adam] Hmm.
[takes a deep breath] Okay.
[screams] Goal!
[laughing] Chivas scores!
-Chuy, put it away! -Yup. I have it recorded. It's old.
translation.zh:
‎-楚伊 把手机放下！
‎-好的 ‎这是录像 以前的比赛

translation.en: [inhales sharply] This is really good.
But this beer's fantastic.
I could sell this one. I want ten kegs of this.
translation.zh: ‎我要卖这款 我想要十桶

translation.en: -This is great. -Ten kegs?
-Yes. -Ten kegs? He wants ten kegs!
-[Wilhelm] We did it! -[Sarah cheers] We did it!
Ah, congratulations, buddy. It's your beer.
translation.zh: ‎恭喜 老哥 这是你的啤酒

translation.en: That is not my beer.
[shouts] We're still laughing. We're having fun!
translation.zh: ‎是吗？继续笑起来 我们在开心！

translation.en: I know it wasn't your beer.
I swapped them out at the last second so that you wouldn't lose your shit
translation.zh:
‎我最后一刻给换掉了
‎这样等你输掉时

translation.en: -when my beer won. -No, no.
-No. -You said you wouldn't do this.
You're not letting me celebrate and gloat and have a good time.
translation.zh:
‎不许我庆祝 洋洋得意
‎不让我开心嘛

translation.en: No, we have bigger problems now. I pissed in your beer.
translation.zh: ‎我们现在有更严重的问题 ‎我在你的啤酒里尿尿了

translation.en: -You what? -I pissed in your beer.
translation.zh: ‎什么？ ‎我在你的啤酒里尿尿了

translation.en: Guys, I taste a lot of beers.
This is so unique. It's distinctive.
You know what? Let's make it 20 kegs.
I want to put this in every restaurant possible, all right?
translation.zh: ‎我想推广到所有餐馆 好吗？

translation.en: -Yes! -Oh, my God!
-What are we gonna do? -I don't know.
You're an imbecile, and I don't have that much piss.
translation.zh: ‎你太蠢了 我可没那么多尿

translation.en: Mmm! I love it!
